thread.title: PERRIS: City announces two restaurants for 2016
thread.title_full: PERRIS: City announces two restaurants for 2016 - Press Enterprise

author: FIELDING BUCK
title: PERRIS: City announces two restaurants for 2016
text:
BY FIELDING BUCK / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 12, 2015 Updated: 6:36 p.m. PERRIS: City announces two restaurants for 2016 Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Related article » Two new restaurants are coming to Perris in 2016 with the help of the Perris Community Economic Development Corporation.
Corky’s Homestyle Kitchen & Bakery, part of an Inland chain, will open the Home Depot Center on Interstate 215 at Ethanac Road with about $200,000 in funding, according to a news release.
La Gare Café and Coffee Roasters will open on D Street near City Hall with about $100,000 in incentives.
